description: The China aster is an incredible plant species and provides beautiful, long lasting colour in gardens for many months. Its puff-like, daisy-like flowers come in various shades of pink, purple and white and are highly attractive to bees and other pollinators. The leaves are small and feathery, while the stems are long and thin, making them perfect for cutting. Planting China aster in batches or as a border gives an especially good look in the garden. They thrive in full sun and produce blooms from mid-summer to mid-autumn. China aster's long flowering season and attractive blooms make it an amazing plant for any garden!
